titles.title: Student and Business Partnership for Credit Act of 1994

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow businesses a credit against income tax for providing work experiences for high school juniors and seniors for which the students receive credit toward graduation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H2229)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/13/1994--Introduced. Student and Business Partnership for Credit Act of 1994 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow businesses a credit for providing educational work experience for high school juniors and seniors.
